idea-plugin.name: Executable Runner
idea-plugin.description:
A simple Run/Debug Configuration plugin for running custom executables.

Features:

  • Run predefined executables: Rust Compiler (rustc) and Cargo
  • Run any custom executable from your filesystem
  • Pass command line arguments to executables

Usage:

  1. Go to Run - Edit Configurations
  2. Click the + button and select "Executable Runner"
  3. Choose an executable type or browse for a custom executable
  4. Add any command line arguments
  5. Run your configuration
